meanings.definition: A unit of speed equal to the speed of sound in the medium concerned, especially in air.
meanings.sent1: The jet flew at a high mach, breaking the sound barrier.
meanings.sent2: The aircraft reached mach 2 during the test flight.
meanings.sent3: The mach of the fighter jet made the clouds tremble.
meanings.sent4: Her words cut through the room like a mach through air.
meanings.sent5: The mach of the rocket launch was deafening.

meanings.definition: A number of times the speed of sound in a given medium.
meanings.sent1: The supersonic plane reached a mach of 1.5.
meanings.sent2: The speed of the car was measured at mach 0.8.
meanings.sent3: The mach of the roller coaster ride was exhilarating.
meanings.sent4: His ideas traveled at a mach beyond comprehension.
meanings.sent5: The mach of the thunder was frightening.
